title: Update forbiddenapis to 2.4.1
description:
Forbidden APIs 2.4.1 was released a minute ago: It mainly adds full support for Java 9 by upgrading to ASM 6.0. It also adds Gradle 4 support (not relevant to Lucene/Solr).

This will also update Groovy to latest 2.4.12 version (also for Java 9 support).
